it.polimi.se2018.model

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Cell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represent a cell of a WindowPattern. May contains a Dice.
    Author:
    Federico Haag
    See Also:
    Dice, WindowPattern, Serialized Form

      Constructor for Cell specifying value and color constraints.
